body.query: FROM events | eval ip_str = mv_concat("invalid_", to_string(ip)) | ENRICH networks-policy ON ip_str | sort @timestamp | KEEP ip, name, department, message

Only first 20 failures recorded.", 299 Elasticsearch-8.18.0-a861ca8b2e6841ad99db6912fcf539521ffd4eb5 "Line 1:68: java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: 'invalid_' is not an IP string literal."
